title: Amanda Gore: brain sex - how to sell to women
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Health
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Nonverbal communication
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Human engineering
description: Amanda Gore has some stimulating ideas, specific skills and ways of thinking that will guide you into more productive and effective relationship building. Her background is in physiotherapy, psychology and neurolinguistic programming - and her forte is imparting to her audience, the techniques and ways of thinking necessary to change behaviour. She is a professional speaker and conference facilitator and has her own company which offers consulting services in change facilitation, communication excellence, ergonomics and stress 'busting'. This video was taped at one of Amanda Gore's lectures and the information within can help you build better relationships. Creating and communication in relationships - at home and at work impacts on performance and productivity. Building better relationships is a way to 'change the game' in business and give you the edge over your competitors. Amanda's latest research will help men and women appreciate the almost totally different ways in which we think, communicate and interact.
